response.overview: We start spectating a creative person who misses a chance to make something great. Did we miss her starting point?  Mark Daniel De Castro is a filmmaker who tells his filmmaking and creative journey. How does one's self maintain his Filipino values when he currently stops doing projects and takes a break? Reflecting on one's achievement makes him doubtful of what young Filipinos can offer from a bigger perspective. His hope and enthusiasm from past experiences prove that someone's craft can create bigger changes.  Director Biography - Mark Daniel De Castro
response.title: halagahan sa akin
